articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: ‘I’ve never heard that’: Trump denies knowingly using anti-Semitic term - Al Jazeera
articles.description: The US president used a term some consider a slur while speaking at a rally in Iowa for his America250 celebration.
articles.content:
United States President Donald Trump has professed ignorance about a term he used that is widely considered anti-Semitic, explaining that he did not know it had that meaning.
